Name: Purple Clay
Desc: This clay is very soft and easy to work with.

Name: Black Clay
Desc: This firm clay has a black glossy quality.

Name: Green Clay
Desc: This green clay is firm yet malleable, making it excellent for characters that need to move a lot while keeping their form.

Name: Blue Clay
Desc: Our pacific blue clay is extremely malleable and has good color.

Name: Japanese Wooden Knife
Desc: This knife is finely crafted from real Japanese Dark Oak, a very rare tree.

Name: Stainless steel needle tool
Desc: This handly tool is great for making small details in small firm clay models. Eye protection recommended.

Name: Marble rolling pin
Desc: This heavy rolling pin can quickly flatten out the hardest of clays.

Name: LED Desk Lamp with Clamp
Desc: This lamp can be clipped or screwed down to any normal desk. It provides bright clear light.

Name: Turntable 14\"
Desc: This 14 inch turntable can smoothly rotate models.

Name: Desktop GreenScreen 30\"
Desc: Perfect for adding a green screen to a table top studio miniature environment

Name: Red Clay
Desc: This bright red clay is the color of the blood of your enemies!

Name: Gold Clay
Desc: This glossy golden clay looks like real gold that you can mold in your hands. It is of medium firmness and very malleable.

Name: Studio Quality Drafting Table LED Desk
Desc: This advanced drafting table has been adopted by many claymation artists due to it's ability to be pivoted flat and enable attachments for many assessories.
